languages.text: "Почему ты так стремишься там оказаться? Только из-за реликвии?"
"Why are you so determined to get to the monastery? Is it just because of the relic?"
languages.original_text: "Почему ты так стремишься там оказаться? Только из-за реликвии?"

traits.locale_text: "Why are you so determined to get to the monastery? Is it just because of the relic?"

"Why are you so determined to get to the monastery? Is it just because of the relic?"

languages.text: "Warum wollt Ihr unbedingt zum Kloster? Nur wegen des Reliktes?"
languages.original_text: "Why are you so determined to get to the monastery? Is it just because of the relic?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum wollt Ihr unbedingt zum Kloster? Nur wegen des Reliktes?"

languages.text: « Pourquoi tenez-vous tant à vous rendre au monastère ? Est-ce seulement à cause de la relique ? »
languages.original_text: "Why are you so determined to get to the monastery? Is it just because of the relic?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi tenez-vous tant à vous rendre au monastère ? Est-ce seulement à cause de la relique ? »

languages.text: “你为什么一心要去修道院，就是因为那件圣物吗？”
languages.original_text: "Why are you so determined to get to the monastery? Is it just because of the relic?"

traits.locale_text: “你为什么一心要去修道院，就是因为那件圣物吗？”

languages.text: 「なぜそれほどまでに修道院へ行こうとするのです？単に聖遺物のためですか？」
languages.original_text: "Why are you so determined to get to the monastery? Is it just because of the relic?"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜそれほどまでに修道院へ行こうとするのです？単に聖遺物のためですか？」

languages.text: «¿Por qué es tan importante llegar al monasterio? ¿Es sólo por la reliquia?».
languages.original_text: "Why are you so determined to get to the monastery? Is it just because of the relic?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué es tan importante llegar al monasterio? ¿Es sólo por la reliquia?».

languages.text: "Manastıra gitmeyi neden kafana koydun? Sebebi yadigâr mı?"
languages.original_text: "Why are you so determined to get to the monastery? Is it just because of the relic?"
